title: Add 4th mode tile on Home screen linking to a blank placeholder page

requirements.text: Add a 4th mode tile/card to the Home screen mode grid that navigates to a new placeholder route for a future “real APA match logging” mode.

quotes: “Add a 4th mode tile on the home screen that links to a blank page.”

acceptanceCriteria: Home screen (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx) shows four ModeCard tiles instead of three.
The new tile has an English title and description indicating it is for official/real APA match logging and/or that it is a placeholder.
Clicking the new tile navigates to the new placeholder route without errors.

requirements.text: Create a new blank placeholder page component for the 4th mode and register a new TanStack Router route for it in the app router.

quotes: “Add a 4th mode tile on the home screen that links to a blank page.”

acceptanceCriteria: A new page component exists (new file under frontend/src/pages/...) that renders a simple, blank/placeholder experience with English text (e.g., heading + short message).
The placeholder page includes a clear way to navigate back to Home (e.g., a “Back to Home” button).
frontend/src/App.tsx registers a new route path (new, dedicated path) that renders the placeholder page.
Navigating directly to the new route path renders the placeholder page successfully.

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/immutablePaths must not be edited (compose existing UI components instead).
Keep this change limited to adding the 4th mode tile + a blank placeholder page; do not modify existing match modes, match history behavior, or backend APIs.
All user-facing text must be in English.
nonGoals: Do not implement the real APA match logging form fields yet.
Do not add persistence/saving for the 4th mode yet.
Do not add new backend types, endpoints, or migrations for this placeholder step.
